page.title: 14The Riverside Area
page.content: Above the Everholm is{North Street} where many of the sandstone cottages have been modernised. They have a lovely view over the river. There is a{caravan site}which belongs to the District Council. It is used a lot by tourists in the summer but in the winter it closes. Next to the caravan site on the hill above the river is the{Scout Hut}which is used by the various troops of Boy Scouts and Cubs. This area is one of the nicest parts of Annan and there are many lovely walks to be had by the river between Annan and the next village of Brydekirk.
